values:
I never update this anymore. Sad. I'm really bad at blogging. 

Anyways, moving out of Baltimore(Windsor Mill) to Germantown. I'm really excited because I will be closer to my family and able to work full time since I have day care lined up out there. So yeah. Next weekend is the big move. Packing all this week. Packing is not fun but at least I enjoy unpacking a little. 

On a side note, I am a little jealous of my son's room. His closet is a walk in and mine is kinda small. I guess my lolita clothes will just have to live in my son's closet. He is only 3 so I don't think he will mind much.

life just doesn't want me to accomplish anything. 
i was really eager and willing to do a shit ton of crap at work over the weekend and of course, i get super busy with customers who can't pick out their own shampoo. seriously, my 2 year old son can tell me which shampoo he wants to use so how is it that an adult is incapable of doing so without help? half of the time i just want to ask these women if their husbands/boyfriends/significant others bathe and dress them. people fucking irritate me sometimes. 
and lately i've been super duper paranoid that i'm gonna die at any second now. the fact that my cousin's husband died suddenly a while back doesn't help either. 
there is a lot more explanation to go with the death thing but i don't want to get into it. i'd like to be able to get some sleep tonight.

on top of everything, i've been wanting to start counseling to help me sort out my crazy. but then extra bills pop up followed by a couple of shit paychecks and i'm starting to think that maybe counseling isn't exactly a priority anymore. feeding my child is more important and all i can really afford right now.

thanks life for once again, being an asshole.
ewww, my throat is doing that early sickness scratchy/gooey nastiness. i have a feeling tomorrow i will feel like shit run over twice. nice.

I hate the holidays. I really do. Its the time of the year that people either become huge assholes or insanely depressed. But then there are people who are obscenely cheery. These are the same people who obsessively clean their homes, wake up at 5 am everyday and have a general sunny disposition. To these individuals, fuck you. You make my life hell by giving me unrealistic ideals of what I should be. You are not real, you are robots. 

Most of the time during the holidays, I am crazy-stressed with gifts to give, budgets to manage and generally not feeling that I am up to par with the expectations of the holidays. This year I am gonna try something new. I am gonna stick to what I know, just do what I originally plan and give a mental 'fuck you' to anything/anyone who tries to change this. I will not feel inadequate because I do not have loads of cash to spend on lavish gifts for my loved ones. I will feel proud of my handmade creations and baked goods that I will be giving. Just because they did not cost much does not mean I didn't make them with lots of love and consideration of the recipient. And I WILL NOT BE LISTENING TO HOLIDAY MUSIC. This shit bores me to tears and irritates my soul. This year Santa Claus is staying out of my town and that sleigh can run right off a mountain with all those fuckers inside it laughing all the way.

I feel much better now that I have expressed my thoughts on the holidays. Don't get me wrong, I like getting together with my family and giving gifts but I do not like the bullshit pressure that tends to come with such a widespread commercialized holiday.

I feel like I have wasted my youth. But maybe this will be good motivation to get more done and less moping about it.
I really like that I have gotten back into my old hobbies, like artsy crap and crafty bits. Now I just need to learn how to work my sewing machine.
However, my taking time for me is cutting into other things. Like dishes, cleaning and taking care of James and Perry. But I must not feel bad! Its this or I spend all my time on other things I eventually have another emotional breakdown that totally interrupts my day to day life.
We really need to have the gap between the stove and the cabinets closed off, Perry keeps crawling into it. I'm scared one of these days he will get stuck.



What is really funny is how James yelled at him for coming close while I changed his diaper. He yelled, "No! My diaper!" Nice how my son thinks the cat is gonna steal his diaper.

goldwell colorance 9pv = pastel purple hair

the swatch shows it is pink. goldwell's rep says that they are true to tone and what you see is what you get. sure it is. 

so i mixed conditioner with pravana magenta and red (mostly to cancel out the purple tone magenta tends to have). i'm sure it will be bright for a little but hopefully it will be closer to the pink i've been chasing.

Its seems like for the last 2 months almost my neighborhood has been having issues with the water. For a few weeks they would shut off the water here from 9 am to 6 pm to fix whatever it is that needed to be fixed. Then last night a water main on my street breaks followed by jack-hammering ALL F*ING NIGHT to still not have water this morning. Wtf?!? What the hell am I supposed to do if I need a shower, to take a shit, cook, etc??? This place is becoming unlivable and the least the management office could do is lower our rent temporarily for the HUGE inconvience this has been. But no, they won't because they are assholes. I hate Baltimore!

I hope that things are heading in the right direction. There are things that lay within my future that may bring much joy and contentment. I really hope it works out. I don't want to go into detail and jinx my chances. But for now, its giving me something to work towards. 

My little man is growing up so wonderfully. I hope he always stays this sweet and nothing crushes his dreams. He is dancing to vnv nation as I am typing this. Cute!

Got lots of ideas concerning girly crafty bits. But first I MUST finish all the amigurumi I am making as holiday gifts. I have one somewhat finished (I need to buy stuffing and put it together) and have not even started the second. I think I have 4-5 total I am making. Macarons are also on the holiday baking agenda and I really wanted to practice a little but I don't think that is gonna happen soon. Not before November at least. I need to get up on it though, September is almost over. 

My pink hair is becoming a reality in just a little under 2 weeks. Goldwell 9pv plus a glossing with either pravana light pink or matrix prism plus light pink. I can't wait!!! Its gonna look awesome. Depending on how the glossing goes, I may end up having to stock up on some pink color such as manic panic. Buuuut that's only if pravana or matrix doesn't work. Manic panic is the only one that has worked as far as actually showing up on my hair. Longevity is still an issue but I'll deal. As long as the color is right, I'll deal with frequent application. I really want my cotton candy pink hair.

Speaking of hair.... my mom has finally agreed to let me do some gray coloring on her. I'm gonna be using wella color touch 8/81. Because of it being a demi color, I may have to prelighten a little but I'm sure it will all be okay. I'm just doing it as 'highlights' for now to see if she likes it. The ghd rep that comes to my store said that wella's 8/81 is the perfect 'meryl streep in devil wears prada' color. My mom happens to like that particular style. Or at least that is the impression I get from her. I'm also excited to be doing a body wave for her, it will be a new perm technique for me. I've done it on a manniquin before but its been a while. I feel confident though, my sister's hair was the first straightener/relaxer service I did and that came out well. So I am sure I can do this too.

That is all for now, I really don't have much else worthy of speaking about. Going back to my coffee now. Tasty, tasty coffee.

between this and that person being in and out of the hospital and dealing with a new vehicle and working my ass off at work to help keep on top of things... i've had little time for any thought other than 'has my son eaten anything?, does he need a diaper change?, i need to fax what?, jury duty is when?' someone please run me over with a truck.

first off, my car was on its last leg so my dad and brother tell me its time to give up and move onto another vehicle. that's fine, except i lack the funds to do so. so my father helps me with that as long as i pay him back for EVERYTHING starting now. at this rate, i owe him an organ, my next child and a place to live when he gets all old crazy. (at least that's how i feel) nothing better to send me into a self-loathing depression cuz i can't pay for my shit on my own. i'm 23, i should be able to take care of things like this on my own by now. at least when i get back my amended taxes and taxes for this year, i'll be able to speed things along by handing over larger sums to get me out of this debt. 
THEN.. barry decides to start passing a kidney stone and act like a huge pussy in the process. alright, i shouldn't say that. i understand that it can be very very painful. lets just say that it was the second trip to the hospital that made me sour cuz of his 'can't do a thing cuz i have lots of pain and i'm gonna act like a huge douche about it' attitude. at least he let me sleep until 4:30 am'ish instead of making me take him at 10:30 pm when i was just starting to get comfy in bed.
the next day at work wasn't much better. my manager ends up in the hospital cuz of her gall bladder. so she has that taken out. that leaves me at work on a friday with shipment by myself all day. fun. 

i'm done bitching. time to go take a nap or kill myself.

I'm old. I'm bored. And yeah. So far my professional life is at a standstill. I really really like being where I am at however, I could definitely use more money, especially if I want to wear the daddy pants and let Barry stay at home all the time. He is an awesome at home daddy. 
I should be doing laundry right now, buuuuuuut.... I just don't feel like it. 
And seriously, I really need to stop with the meat. Ever since I started eating fish again, my weight has gone up almost 7 pounds. I know, whoop-de-doo, right? Because I am vertically challenged, 7 pound gain looks like 10. Either that, or I need to quit the cheese. Fucking cheese has a hold on me like no other. One or the other. I  think I'd prefer the quit the cheese though. More beneficial to quit cheese than fish for nutritional reasons. Maybe I'll quit cheese....

A few weeks ago I actually sought out and bought banana clips. Yes, those horrid hair accessories from the 80's that made it possible to look even more ridiculous with crimped hair, as if the crimped hair wasn't enough. The strangest part is all the complements I get on my hair when I do wear it to work. Barry makes fun of me for it. He teases me about a lot. 

Annnnd, Depeche Mode concert on the 28th this month and I am totally going!!!! I love Depeche Mode.

July 28 - Washington D.C. - Depeche Mode concert 

I am so there!

And their new album comes out in April.
Their new single is quite good.

alright. my thingy said its been 9 weeks since i last posted. so here is what's new in kathie's world.

- I got married. 
- My second job is waitressing at this crap restaurant where I make no tips. So now I'm looking for a new one.
- I'm pretty sure that Barry didn't save my gta 4 game because he thinks  it auto saves. I've told him that game lies. Lots of progress lost.
-I've discovered how awesome Netflix is.
- I'm considering going vegan.
- I got a raise at my first job. I just wish I had gotten more. Strangely though it doesn't make me like my job less. 
- my sister (evie) gave birth to 2 girls and they are adorable.

i guess that's all for now. someday I'll come up with a more detailed post.

lately i've been wanting a kitty kat sooooooooo badly. i've even gone as far as figuring costs, adjusting my budget to allow for a kitty and looking at animal shelter listings for a kitty. i want to think that my desire for a kitty will subside eventually but then i've wanted a kitty ever since smokey died and never really been living somewhere that allows pets.

looking at kittie adoption listings is killing me. every single grey kitten makes me cry and miss smokie so much. this kittie-kittie is really adorable and still very young which i know is something barry wants cuz he doesn't want an animal that is already set in their ways. this kittie-kittie reminds me a lot of smokie. i'd love love love to have these kitties if barry were to magically agree to having more than one kittie.

awwwww. i want a kittie.

It's not that I don't love him and want to be with him forever. But is this really how it is supposed to be like? Less than perfect yet still right? Maybe I just spend too much time at home and over exert myself at my two jobs so that I am too tired to really do anything on my days off. But my life is far from what I had always hoped for. I know it is not too late to turn things around and make it what I want but my biggest issue is that I am more than certain that I do not know what I want. I'm clueless as far as what I want to do professionally and the man I love is less than whom I had always hoped for. He is becoming a better man everyday and I adore that he tries as much as he does. I don't know... I guess it is the fact that he doesn't believe in marriage and is only marrying me because he wants to give me everything that I want. But knowing that makes me think that the marriage is only going to feel hollow and eventually turn to divorce. Again, I know I have control over how things go down between us but I can't help feeling this way. 
 My life just isn't everything I wanted. Knowing this harsh reality is killing my soul.

i hate my second job (waitress at bar in beltsville)

it was okay at first but now i hate it 

the money is good but i don't feel like it is worth it

i have to dress in a way to appear as 'eye candy' (my assistant manager there actually used these words) so now i feel cheap and slutty while i am there

drunk guys just want to grab my ass and i am paid under the table

i need to get out of there

With a recent visit to punkrockdomestics.com and lots of hope, I am collecting soda can tabs to make things with.

This stuff looks really cool.

www.ecoist.com/pc/viewCategories.asp


There are also bunches of other projects I want to do right now such as crocheting projects and candy sushi....

So what is the point of me posting all this random ramblings of crafts? Meh! I was bored really.
I don't have anything to talk about that needs public attention really.

Oh! My work just got in new products, fake lashes. Weee... I already bought a set to try out. They are actually very well priced too. I still need to get adhesive remover though.

And my social life sucks balls right now. I need to hang out with more females.

i wish i am able to change undesirable things about my past but everyone wishes that. i guess the best thing to do is not think about it and focus on what to do in the future and now. blah. .... blah blah..... blah blah BLAH....

my boyfriend has completely unrealistic ideas. 

i wish i could work full time. i really like my job right now and kinda want to branch out into doing hair and shit again. but for now i'm keeping it limited to personal favors... i hate the general public and their undying desire to harshly criticize my skills.

i might have a personal issue. but then i might not. i'm not sure how i feel about it or about talking about it. i don't think it's a huge problem but my boyfriend says it is. hmmm.... i'll come clean about it someday but right now i'm just gonna beat around the bush about it for a while.


my baby got so big while i wasn't looking... where the hell did the time go?

So my application for suicide girls was accepted and now I get to send in my paperwork and upload a set when I have that done. I feel rather special but at the same time I can't help thinking that a lot of girls probably are accepted and asked to upload a set. 
Now I get to talk to the boyfriend and make sure he is okay with me trying out for suicide girls.
It would be the easiest $500 I've ever made....

Not that much has really been going on. Just work, bills, baby and sleep. That is my life. I really need to work on mixing some happy in there. 

What I really need to do is finish the blanket I've been crocheting for almost 3 months now. I don't work on it a little everyday and that's my downfall. I tell myself everyday to do something with it and I never do. Maybe I should just finish the skein I'm on and say its done. But that would be cheating. I want my blanket to be cuddle worthy. 

This weekend is meh. The expected pool party tomorrow should be loads of fun but I still have lots of stretch marks and loose skin. I know I could have prevented the loose skin by losing weight at a slower rate but.... I'm not gonna get into that right now.  But.. something fun now... VEGAN TRUFFLES! That's right I am gonna make vegan chocolate truffles for the party and not with that nasty soy cream cheese crap either.  The recipe calls for cashews blended into a creamy consistency instead of soy crap.  So I expect it to be super tasty. I'm not telling anyone at the party they're vegan either. I'm scared that no one will eat them then. Except maybe for this one woman, Marcie only because she is really into all that organic shit. I'll post pictures of my culinary triumph later. 

Speaking of parties.. my son's first birthday is on the July 6th. A party on each weekend. Nice. 
I need to ask my mom if she wants me to make anything to bring to the party. Truffles perhaps?

I saw that gas around here is $4.05/gallon. I don't think I can afford to travel very far anymore. When I say this I mean to areas like northern Virginia and Frederick. This blows a lot. More than I can say.

My district manager told me the nice things that my manager has been telling her about me. Made me feel really good. I hope things continue to be pleasant there. One co-worker is pissing me off a little but I'm not really gonna give it a second thought. Just doesn't matter to me a whole lot. 

Tomorrow James and I are going to visit my friend, Lexie. I haven't seen her since high school. We reconnected a few months ago and talked a bit here and there but never actually made plans before. I'm a little nervous about seeing her, she was always a little critical of me. But it wasn't just me, she was like that with everyone. There's always a chance she is different now. Her daughter just turned one. It was funny how we had babies around the same time. We had always had a lot in common. 

James' first birthday is next month.  Right about now a normal person would gush about how they can't believe their baby is growing up so fast and blah blah blah, but I will be doing plenty of that at his party. I do feel rather aged though.

I love my new job! Everyone is super nice, I can have whatever hair color I want and 45 minute lunch break! Hells yeah! I also get company paid life insurance but that isn't health insurance so I really don't care. However if I am somehow magically able to be full time, health insurance is available for me to have. I still have to ask whom they offer for said insurance. 

Not to mention that the store is not open to the general public. Ha! The only dumb-asses I have to deal with are the ones still in school for their license.  

My son's first birthday is coming up soon. I am starting to feel old now. I really shouldn't. When he turns 21 is when I should feel old. Or when I turn 30.

There has been talk of adding a pet to our family. But that won't actually happen for another year or two. 
I miss having my kitty. 

So it looks like the wedding will be on April 2nd either next year or 2010. At least I have picked a day. Now to pick the year....

There has also been talk of relocating again. Barry is considering Silver Spring/Wheaton area. I'd still very much like to go back to Frederick. Not just because mom and dad are there but most of my friends (the ones that really care and actually come visit me) are there and I miss them soo much. I would be closer to my sister too but I would be closer to her in Silver Spring as well. And there is the issue of my job as well. Right now I work in Owings Mills. That's a hell of a drive. Transfer? Depends on if there is a location around there. I know there is one in Frederick though.  The lease is up in November so there is time to figure something out.
i feel that i am too young to know anything worthwhile. i'm not old/experienced enough to know anything helpful. i'm young so therefore stupid.

It turns out that I very much did get the job.  I feel really good about this one because I feel that this job is an actual step somewhere. Not just some meaningless retail job. While it is a retail job, a cosmetology license is required to work there as it is not open to the public, just licensed professionals. Maybe after a while I may decide  I want to do hair again and this would make the transition easier as well as finding work.  

After kinda a long while thinking about what I really want in a job I have found I just don't want a job. I want a career, a meaningful job that will fill a void that hasn't felt full ever since I was let down by Simply Wireless and their 'promises'.  I guess the lack of penis and the fact I wasn't selling an ungodly amount of cell phones/services didn't help obtaining that much desired promotion. Wireless retail just wasn't for me. Neither was being a camera monkey for mall security. Mall security? Come on. I should have known better.

I lost all of my baby weight plus the preexisting chub that I acquired from heavy drinking and ramen noodles.  I feel rather good about it. Except for the loose skin. I may not be fat but I wobble. And wobble I do!

I always feel like I fail to speak intelligently.

I may have gotten a new job at a beauty supply store. This one isn't open to the public so that should take out half of the possible dumb-asses to walk into the store. I am still waiting on them to call me back about how much I will be getting paid. I'll most likely call them tomorrow about that if I don't hear anything today. I hope I got the job, at the end of the interview she asked when I will be available to start and I gave her a date. She wrote it down and then had me watch a video about the job and what it entitles. I probably am stupid for thinking I possibly didn't get the job but you never know.  All I know is that working at Hollister is killing my soul.

Things are things. Can't say more, can't say less. But at least I don't feel depressed. Today at least.

So now it is up to me to pick a date for my wedding. I wanted this so much and now I can't decide on a damn day. I am thinking possibly April 2 2009 or 2010. (4/2 get it?) I am leaning towards 2010 because I am obsessed with even numbers. I don't even want a big wedding. Something laid back and fun along the lines of a tea party. I want to make pretty pastries for it and wear something ultra-girlie. A wedding that is small and inexpensive as possible. And preferably before Rev. Garret dies. He may seem like he has been around for forever but unfortunately he won't. Need to make up mind fast!
I have more pictures on flickr and on glittercupcakes group.

I hate mondays but not this monday.... 

I get to make cute cupcakes for Barry!!!! (his birthday is tomorrow)

So I have white cake mix and icing and I will be decorating with food coloring, sprinkles, edible glitter and candles. I'll post pictures when I have completed them. 
I love baking so this is very exciting for me. Someday I want to try baking all sorts of cute things like macarons(not macaroons), petit fours, croissants with awesome fillings, mini tarts and all sorts of others. If I could, just for fun, I'd like to apprentice a baker so I can learn the secrets of sweets. And finally learn to make decent cookies. For some reason I cannot make cookies to save my life. I'd also like to try making chocolates as well. Mmmm...

Barry wants to move somewhere closer to Wheaton when our lease is over. He says he will find us a new place, not at the last minute. Sure. We will see.  He procrastinates more than me. I didn't think it was possible but he manages to do it.

I got a new job. At Hollister. I am such a weenie.

Hollister isn't really my style but hey, a discount is a discount. And I don't have to wear makeup to appear acceptable. In fact, they encourage a 'natural' look. The pay is shit but it is better than nothing. 

I am still looking for a job. I have a lot of applications floating around out there. I think I have close to 20 out now. Fun.

I saw this article thingy (http://www.mookychick.co.uk/diy_ethic/kanzashi_tutorial.php) about making flowers. It looks like fun. I shall try it sometime.

Still making blanket. Looks rather good. Only 1/3 done though. Blah!

That poor little Kathie girl, she is so boring. 

But... life is all Care Bears and rainbows for her.

Sure it is.

I'm trying to crochet a blanket. Keyword being trying. I totally fucked up the first 10 rows and by the time I finally got it right I was too tired to pull it all apart and redo the whole thing. I finished a second batch of 10 rows and am still very tempted to pull it apart because of the first 10 rows. If I do it I will forever trying to crochet this damn blanket but if I do I will be  possibly more satisfied with the finished product. Something tells me I will be redoing the blanket later. I hate having a strong desire to do things perfect. Most of the time at least.

My work situation sucks right now and I'd rather not talk about it. That's why I have been avoiding that subject. I might say what happened after everything is all better but for now I'd rather not mention it other than to say 'currently under construction'. So to speak.

James is growing so fast. Knowing that makes me feel old. I still have a lot of mixed feelings about being a mom. I just wish I could have planned it instead of 'oops I'm pregnant'. Either way, I'm glad my little boy is here.

I haven't posted in a while. That's probably cuz I am a wiener. A big one too. 

It is very early in the morning at the moment. James is up with me because he couldn't go back to sleep either. I fell asleep earlier (4 PMish on 3/31) and planned on staying in bed until a reasonable 7 or 8 AM but I was unable to stay unconscious thus ruining my plans. I got up around 10 PMish and have been up since. James woke up around 2 AM and after an hour of trying to rock him back to sleep, I threw in the towel and brought him downstairs to hang out with me. I love how cheerful he is all the time. I couldn't imagine being without my sunshine. James is the main reason I haven't killed myself yet. I just hope when he grows up he doesn't hate me. 

A friend of mine and his wife are moving to Germany. I'm gonna miss them. They were the people I invented drunk sunday movie night with. That was great fun. I can't drink like that anymore though. Not just because of the responsibility of being a mommy but also because the pregnancy did something wicked to my body and I have not been the same since. Not to mention the dramatic weight loss I went through probably messed it up a good bit too. But hangovers were never fun anyways. I do enjoy and appreciate my new found sobriety but a good hard drink is nice to have but only maybe a few times a year because I cannot stand being hungover that much. That and I don't want to be a bad role model for my son. I want to be able to tell when he steals my booze. Geez, I am awful.

I don't like the neighborhood I live in. I feel unsafe and I also feel there should be more sidewalks. Strange things happen at strange hours and the homes are poorly maintained. The leasing agent we worked with while getting this place was nosy and rude. There is some sort of graffiti on almost every building and playground. I wish I could move but this is what we can afford and Barry hates Frederick and anywhere in Virginia. I can't see why he like this general area. 

I really should get some sleep.

Alrighty....

So I was at the grocery store for my usual shopping trip I do after getting paid. As I was looking for some matzo ball soup mix (which there was none.. failure!) I noticed some spanish guy walking into the aisle staring at me. He walks by and then walks by again. The second time he walked by he dropped something near me. So I took a glance. HUGE mistake!!! The south of the border stranger had dropped photos of a naked (most likely himself) man with a hard-on. 

Ew ew eeeeew!
 
Who the hell walks around with pictures like that?! In a grocery store?!

All I know is that I wanted to vomit. But what it did do was cut my shopping trip short and I paid  for the items I had previously picked up and left. 

That is the absolute last time I will ever shop at that particular grocery store.

I never feel like going to work.

I am always at home. I need to get my ass in gear and take me and the baby outside once in a while. Even if it is to the creepy nearby mall to loiter.

I pick up and temporarily discontinue hobbies way to often. I tend to do it more during a certain phase I see myself go through. 

There is something very very wrong with me. I know what it is and then I don't. Either way I can't tell anyone and the person that does know doesn't want to hear about it. He said to hide it from him. I fucking will then.

I don't think I am going to vote this year. 

I have convinced myself that eggs are a tangable symbol of abortion or something of that nature and haven't been able to get myself to eat them since. 

I still feel guilty and ashamed to ask anyone for any sort of help. I had always hoped I'd be able to get along relying on no one but me. Then I think that maybe that's why my brother acts the way he does sometimes. 

Having no health insurance really sucks.

So I modified a recipe for sugar cookies from a box of Jiffy mix. Gotta love that Jiffy mix! Here it goes: Angry Cookies *2 cups Jiffy mix *1 tsp vanilla *icing that comes in a tube so you can write with it - any color/colors *1/3 cup soy or almond milk - unsweetened vanilla or plain *1 tsp cornstartch *1/4 cup silken caramel flavored tofu - i used the kind made by pete's tofu2go *2/3 cup sugar or splenda(for the calorie conscience) *5 tbsp butter, soft Mix the liquid ingredients with the silken tofu in a blender until smooth. Then mix with the solid/powdery ingredients. Congratulations, you made cookie dough. Grease cookie sheet, place balls of dough on cookie sheet(about the size of a tablespoon type balls). Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes or until you think they are done. After baking let cool for 10 minutes. Take the writing icing and write your favorite obscenities on cookies. Yay! Cookie fun! my first batch

Sometimes my brain goes on a break without my permission while I carry on conversations only to pause for a moment and ask if I had done such and such within the last ten minutes.

Within the past week, "Stranger than Fiction" has become one of my favorite movies to stare at and space out in front of after James goes to bed. I think way too much and it makes the Kathie kinda sad. I love my baby and I wish I was better for him. Way too many things have been going off in my head recently and I just can't handle any of it well. If anyone pays attention to this post I will consider myself lucky that someone even cares that little bit to make sure I am kinda sane and a fully functioning human. Crap on that and crap on me. 

I've spent the last few nights either sleeping on the coach away from Barry or sleeping in very late while Barry is with James. Some days I eat a lot or none at all. I find myself losing interest in a lot of things. Sometimes I find myself thinking about running away or worse, I can't say. Oh well. I'm blank. I can't think anymore. Or I just don't want to say cuz what I am thinking could hurt others or myself if I admit these thoughts. I am lucky if I muster up enough desire to do the dishes and the laundry in the same day. I don't think I am very happy right now. If anything I feel like I can't talk to anyone anymore. All that seems to happen is I get critisized about everything I do and no matter how hard I try, its not as good as someone thought I should be doing. I hate myself so much. I know I am not good enough. I never was.

first off, as i am typing this i have a baby in my lap. so no capital letters or correct punctuation. in case the few who read this is wondering.

so james is now making creepy baby noises similar to the noises made by the ghost thingy in the grudge. dont know where he heard it or why he does it. and he screams after he hears someone else scream. its so cute!

we've been moved into our new place for 2 weeks now and i still havent managed to get shit unpacked completely. i feel like a lazy bum.

note to evie: come visit sometime.

as soon as i get all unpacked and the necessary things get taken to goodwill or placed for 'recycling' then i will consider getting a small hobby or the artsy/crafty variety. 

i am baking pies as christmas gifts this year cuz i be kinda poor. but i make kick-ass pies.

more later perhaps....?

The sweetie and I must move out of our apartment by November 15. I found a nice townhouse in the Baltimore-ish area for less per month than what we are paying now. I like it, the boy still needs to go look at it and give his approval. I just hope we can live there for more than the usual 5-6 months we've been doing for the past year. I wish that moving itself wasn't so much of a bitch. Don't get me wrong, the feeling you get with a new home and all the fun of rearranging things and unpacking is great but all the packing and lifting and carrying shit is not great.  The sooner the better.

I would like to get rid of some shit so that I have less to move. I am finally gonna chuck the dresser that was passed down to me after ALL my siblings used it. The thing just won't stay in one piece! Then there is all the clothes that not only do I never wear but can't cuz they are just too small. I finally realized that I will just never be that thin again or if I do manage to lose that much, they are just very much not my style anymore. Some of them I will recycle but others just need to go. 

My birthday is soon. Just turning 22, nothing special. The special one, turning 21, was wasted cuz I was preggernant. The only thing to look forward to: turning 24, my car insurance will go down considerably. The really sucky part about this year: I have to work a 14 hour day that day. (handcuff and pepper spray certification then my usual shift)

Nothing really special happened today. Well, Jimmy Jimmy did make some clicking noises for the first time. It was really cute and prompted me to make clicking noises at him for 20 minutes in an effort to get him to do it again. He waited until daddy came home so that he could witness the new noise. Then he did as I had, funny how babies make adults act so weird.

I need to pick up a fun new hobby. I think I might be getting depressed because all I do is stay at home and go to work. Sometimes I cry for no real reason. Actually I can't say that, I did cry yesterday because I had watched a VERY emotional episode of Scrubs. Afterwards when I realized that an episode of Scrubs made me cry, I felt slightly silly.

I have work tomorrow, I need to try to sleep. Night!

So the last time I posted, I was just leaving Simply Wireless for Victoria's Secret... only to return to Simply Wireless a month later. Damn them and their health insurance benefits! The reason for needing the health insurance, my baby. Yes, that is correct. I reproduced and spawned me a little minion of my own. A boy minion to be exact. My due date was June 17 but didn't actually have him until July 6 because of my cunt-bag doctor. His name is James Alexander. A week or two after we(my boyfriend, his daddy, and I) brought him home, I was watching America's Next Top Model and noticed that the runway coach is named Miss J. Alexander. Figures I would name my child after a man whom prefers to wear dresses.

As for work, I finally left Simply Wireless and I now work as a security guard for Columbia Mall. Go ahead and laugh. My parents had asked if I met the height requirement when I told them. There is no height requirement for that job, in case some of you were wondering.

Besides all that, really nothing new in my life. Well, I do live in Ellicott City now but thats about it. All I do now is go to work, stay at home with the baby, cook, clean, and occasionally see a friend or two. I know my life sounds so boring and resembles that of a house wifey type but I could care less. I am happy.

I am gonna be 22 at the end of the month. Nothing to really celebrate there.

Today is my last day at the cell phone kiosk, yay!

Saturday I shall be 21. 

My number is changing soon, so if you don't already have it... ask me for it.

Love!

Work always does this to me. I can never be consistant with my social life because I end up working so damn much all the time. Arg! Release the pirate in me. Anyways, all this hard work might pay off soon. I heard from someone that I am being considered for a managment position at my job. Unfortunately nothing is going to happen with that until after November or December. I just hope I don't go through a big change like that until after the  holidays so that I don't get stressed out.

My job has turned me into the biggest cell phone geek though. 

Ballet is going really well this year. It better go well, I am paying for it! Michelle, the teacher that whipped my ass into shape one year, is teaching thursday night class. She makes me hurt so bad. Stephanie works me hard enough and now I have to deal with Michelle a.k.a. pregnant devil woman. All I can say is I better be a pro by June if I am gonna hurt this much.

Somnuk comes home in November! Yay! I miss him so much.

So tomorrow is my last day at Victoria's. I am so fucking excited. And almost everyone I work with is leaving soon as well. Haha, manager has to hire a whole new staff before the end of the month. Sucks to be her.

I failed to mention last that I will be selling cell phones. Fun stuff.

My feetsies are cold. Oh so cold. So are my hands. Oh so cold.
Hmmm, not much else to talk about. Trying not to be stressed about the sister's wedding cuz I figure if someone is gonna go crazy, someone has to be there to help calm them down. I think I will be that person.

Beaker(the kitty) is a fat bitch. That is all.

Hello everyone!!! Don't really know what to say to start this entry with just for the sheer fact that I haven't posted in a very very very long time. So... lets begin.

New job! It will probably suck just cuz it pays comission but then at the same time I am confidant that I will be sucessful. So please, don't rain on my parade by telling me negative things about it like, "are you sure you want to do this?" and similar comments. I got offered the job cuz I am good at selling not because I impressed someone during the interview. So now I get to go to Fairfax for my training for 4 days.

I miss my sister right now. I feel like she is either a)too stressed out from everything to try to keep in touch(which is completely understandable, i had a kitty die before too. it is not fun) or b) just doesnt want to talk to me. I hope it is not B cuz that would make me extremely upset and sad. I love my sister and would be destroyed if she didnt like me anymore.

Finally went to the doctor after being sick for a week. I asked my parents to help me but I really didnt want to because I do not want to be a burden upon them anymore. This also translates into needing to move out and become independent. I would be able to if I made enough money. Hey, that is what this new job is all about. I'm so clever!(sez the retard who wears little dresses with pants, a trend I really need to rid myself of)

The store manager at Victoria's begged me not to leave. But at least I am always welcome back if I choose to go back.

Eh, I guess I am done for now. I'll try posting more often cuz I know how much you kids love reading about me(not!). Love!

I'm not really much for posting anymore. Maybe LJ has lost its alluring power. Perhaps its cuz I really don't want to talk about my feelings or anyone for that matter. I'm just really tired of me, of life, everything. Done, just done.
Anyways there is a widespread shortage of orange essence cleanser but I was able to find some on the internet and ordered it. Yay for oranges!
Going now to do things. I will post again someday. Maybe...
